# Leader information

# Overview

In partnership with ASA Biopharm WG, our goals are to influence regulatory guidelines, elevate industry practices, and raise awareness of Bayesian methods in nonclinical areas. We aim to develop specific use-cases in CMC and nonCMC areas, fostering an inclusive, diverse, and transformative impact. Join us.
